channel.title: Portfolios on Melbourne Open Research Network
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Melbourne Open Research Network

item.title: Deakin Open Research Network
item.description: Deakin Open Research Network Deakin University is a young university spread across 4 campuses, in Burwood, Geelong, and Warnambool. The open research community at Deakin is primarily located at the Burwood campus and is eager to know open research advocates in the local area. We will be running a weekly “open science hacky hour” on the Burwood campus, so if you want to learn more about open research, find new ways to open up your work, or just want to meet some new people, let us know and come along.

item.title: University of Melbourne Open Research Community
item.description: University of Melbourne Open Research Community The University of Melbourne is the home of a number of groups interested in Open practices and Meta-research. They regularly host workshops, meetings, and presentations on relevant issues. Check them out and go along
